attributes.action: improve local trains between Manchester and Chester via Altrincham and Manchester and Crewe via Stockport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On December 15th 2008 the local Manchester to Chester via Altrincham and Manchester to Crewe via Stockport train services have been/will be cutback to accommodate extra Manchester to London trains.  This petition is to reinstate those trains, which are much needed, as well as reopening the Northwich to Sandbach line linking the two fore-mentioned lines, which would also assist with passenger flows.
